tasks.title: Project Setup and Configuration
tasks.description: Initialize Next.js 16 project with App Router and configure development environment
tasks.details: Create new Next.js 16 project using 'npx create-next-app@latest' with App Router enabled. Configure TypeScript, ESLint, Tailwind CSS. Set up folder structure following App Router conventions: app/, components/, lib/, types/. Install required dependencies: @appwrite.io/node, stripe, @aws-sdk/client-s3, shadcn/ui components. Configure environment variables structure and create .env.example file.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify project builds successfully, all dependencies install correctly, and development server starts without errors. Test environment variable loading.

subtasks.title: Initialize Next.js 16 Project with App Router
subtasks.description: Create new Next.js 16 project using create-next-app with App Router enabled and TypeScript configuration
subtasks.details: Run 'npx create-next-app@latest' command with App Router, TypeScript, ESLint, and Tailwind CSS options enabled. Verify project structure is created correctly with app/ directory and configuration files.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify project builds successfully with 'npm run build' and development server starts without errors using 'npm run dev'

subtasks.title: Set up Folder Structure and Project Organization
subtasks.description: Create organized folder structure following App Router conventions and best practices
subtasks.details: Create folders: app/ (for routes), components/ (reusable UI components), lib/ (utilities and configurations), types/ (TypeScript type definitions). Set up proper index files and organize components into logical subdirectories.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify all folders are created correctly and can import/export modules between directories without path issues

subtasks.title: Install and Configure Required Dependencies
subtasks.description: Install all necessary packages including Appwrite, Stripe, AWS SDK, and shadcn/ui components
subtasks.details: Install dependencies: @appwrite.io/node for backend integration, stripe for payments, @aws-sdk/client-s3 for R2 storage, shadcn/ui components for UI. Configure package.json scripts and verify compatibility.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run 'npm install' successfully, verify no dependency conflicts, and test that all packages can be imported without errors

subtasks.title: Configure Development Tools and Code Quality
subtasks.description: Set up ESLint, Prettier, and TypeScript configurations for consistent code quality
subtasks.details: Configure ESLint rules for Next.js and TypeScript, set up Prettier for code formatting, configure TypeScript strict mode settings. Add pre-commit hooks for code quality enforcement.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run ESLint and Prettier on sample code, verify TypeScript compilation works correctly, and test that code quality tools catch common issues

subtasks.title: Set up Environment Variables and Configuration
subtasks.description: Create environment variable structure and configuration files for different environments
subtasks.details: Create .env.example file with all required environment variables (Appwrite, Stripe, R2 credentials). Set up environment variable validation and loading. Create separate configurations for development, staging, and production.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify environment variables load correctly in development, test that missing variables are properly detected, and validate configuration works across different environments

tasks.title: Appwrite Configuration and Database Schema
tasks.description: Set up Appwrite backend services and create all required database collections
tasks.details: Initialize Appwrite project and configure authentication settings. Create collections: Users (userId, name, avatar, role, createdAt, updatedAt), Courses (courseId, title, slug, description, price, thumbnail, category, level, instructorId, status, totalDuration, totalLessons, publishedAt), Modules (moduleId, courseId, title, description, order), Lessons (lessonId, moduleId, courseId, title, description, videoUrl, duration, order, isFreePreview, resources), Purchases (purchaseId, userId, courseId, stripePaymentId, amount, status, purchasedAt), Progress (progressId, userId, courseId, lessonId, completed, watchedSeconds), Reviews (reviewId, userId, courseId, rating, comment), Categories (categoryId, name, slug, description, icon, order). Set up proper indexes and permissions.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all collections are created with correct attributes and indexes. Test CRUD operations on each collection. Validate permissions are properly configured.

subtasks.title: Initialize Appwrite Project and Authentication Setup
subtasks.description: Set up new Appwrite project and configure authentication settings with email/password and OAuth providers
subtasks.details: Create new Appwrite project in console, configure project settings, enable email/password authentication, set up OAuth providers (Google, GitHub), configure authentication security settings, and set up email templates for verification
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify project is accessible, authentication methods are enabled, and test user registration/login flows work correctly

subtasks.title: Create Core User and Course Collections
subtasks.description: Set up Users and Courses collections with all required attributes and relationships
subtasks.details: Create Users collection with userId, name, avatar, role, createdAt, updatedAt attributes. Create Courses collection with courseId, title, slug, description, price, thumbnail, category, level, instructorId, status, totalDuration, totalLessons, publishedAt attributes. Set up proper data types and validation rules
subtasks.testStrategy: Test CRUD operations on both collections, verify all attributes are properly typed, and validate required field constraints

subtasks.title: Create Course Structure Collections (Modules and Lessons)
subtasks.description: Set up Modules and Lessons collections to define course curriculum structure
subtasks.details: Create Modules collection with moduleId, courseId, title, description, order attributes. Create Lessons collection with lessonId, moduleId, courseId, title, description, videoUrl, duration, order, isFreePreview, resources attributes. Establish proper relationships between courses, modules, and lessons
subtasks.testStrategy: Test hierarchical relationships between courses, modules, and lessons. Verify ordering works correctly and foreign key constraints are enforced

subtasks.title: Create Transaction and Progress Tracking Collections
subtasks.description: Set up Purchases, Progress, and Reviews collections for user interactions and tracking
subtasks.details: Create Purchases collection with purchaseId, userId, courseId, stripePaymentId, amount, status, purchasedAt attributes. Create Progress collection with progressId, userId, courseId, lessonId, completed, watchedSeconds attributes. Create Reviews collection with reviewId, userId, courseId, rating, comment attributes
subtasks.testStrategy: Test purchase tracking, progress updates, and review submissions. Verify user can only access their own data and progress tracking works accurately

subtasks.title: Create Categories Collection and Configure Indexes and Permissions
subtasks.description: Set up Categories collection and configure database indexes and security permissions for all collections
subtasks.details: Create Categories collection with categoryId, name, slug, description, icon, order attributes. Set up database indexes for performance optimization on frequently queried fields (courseId, userId, slug, etc.). Configure collection-level permissions for read/write access based on user roles and ownership
subtasks.testStrategy: Test category management, verify database performance with indexes, and validate security permissions prevent unauthorized access to collections

tasks.title: Cloudflare R2 Integration Setup
tasks.description: Configure Cloudflare R2 storage for video, image, and resource file handling
tasks.details: Set up Cloudflare R2 bucket and configure AWS SDK v3 client. Create utility functions for file upload, signed URL generation, and file deletion. Implement folder structure: videos/, images/, resources/, thumbnails/. Configure CORS settings for browser uploads. Create helper functions for generating time-limited signed URLs (1 hour expiry) for secure content access.
tasks.testStrategy: Test file upload to R2 bucket, verify signed URL generation works correctly, test file deletion functionality. Validate CORS configuration allows browser uploads.

subtasks.title: Set up Cloudflare R2 bucket and AWS SDK v3 client configuration
subtasks.description: Create and configure Cloudflare R2 bucket with proper settings and initialize AWS SDK v3 client for R2 operations
subtasks.details: Create new R2 bucket in Cloudflare dashboard. Generate R2 API tokens with appropriate permissions. Configure AWS SDK v3 S3Client with R2 endpoint and credentials. Set up environment variables for R2 configuration including bucket name, access key, secret key, and endpoint URL.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test bucket creation and verify AWS SDK client can connect to R2 endpoint successfully

subtasks.title: Implement folder structure and file upload utility functions
subtasks.description: Create organized folder structure in R2 bucket and build utility functions for file upload operations
subtasks.details: Implement folder structure: videos/, images/, resources/, thumbnails/. Create uploadFile utility function that handles file uploads to appropriate folders based on file type. Add file validation, size limits, and error handling. Include progress tracking for large file uploads.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test file uploads to each folder type, verify files are stored in correct locations with proper naming conventions

subtasks.title: Create signed URL generation utility functions
subtasks.description: Build helper functions for generating time-limited signed URLs for secure content access
subtasks.details: Create getSignedUrl utility function that generates presigned URLs with 1-hour expiry for secure file access. Implement different URL types for GET (download/view) and PUT (upload) operations. Add URL validation and error handling for expired or invalid URLs.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test signed URL generation for different file types, verify URLs expire after 1 hour, and validate secure access works correctly

subtasks.title: Implement file deletion utility functions
subtasks.description: Create utility functions for safely deleting files from R2 storage with proper error handling
subtasks.details: Create deleteFile utility function that removes files from R2 bucket. Implement batch deletion for multiple files. Add safety checks to prevent accidental deletion of important files. Include error handling for non-existent files and permission issues.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test single and batch file deletion operations, verify error handling for non-existent files, and validate proper cleanup

subtasks.title: Configure CORS settings for browser uploads
subtasks.description: Set up CORS configuration to allow direct browser uploads to R2 bucket
subtasks.details: Configure CORS policy in R2 bucket settings to allow browser uploads. Set allowed origins, methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE), and headers. Configure preflight request handling and credential settings. Test cross-origin requests from the application domain.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test direct browser uploads to R2 bucket, verify CORS headers are properly set, and validate uploads work from different domains

tasks.title: Authentication System Implementation
tasks.description: Implement complete authentication flow using Appwrite Auth
tasks.details: Create authentication context using Appwrite SDK. Implement registration with email verification, login/logout functionality, password reset flow. Create middleware for route protection. Build auth pages: /login, /register, /forgot-password, /reset-password. Implement session management with HTTP-only cookies. Add role-based access control (student, instructor, admin). Create auth utilities for checking user permissions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test complete registration flow including email verification. Verify login/logout works correctly. Test password reset functionality. Validate session persistence and middleware protection.

subtasks.title: Setup Appwrite Authentication Context and SDK Integration
subtasks.description: Create authentication context using Appwrite SDK and configure authentication client
subtasks.details: Initialize Appwrite client with authentication configuration. Create React context for authentication state management. Setup authentication provider component to wrap the application. Configure Appwrite project settings for authentication including OAuth providers if needed.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test Appwrite client initialization and context provider setup. Verify authentication state is properly managed across components.

subtasks.title: Implement User Registration with Email Verification
subtasks.description: Build user registration functionality with email verification flow using Appwrite Auth
subtasks.details: Create registration API endpoints and form components. Implement email verification process using Appwrite's verification system. Build registration page at /register with form validation. Handle registration errors and success states. Setup email templates for verification.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test complete registration flow including form validation, email sending, and verification link functionality. Verify error handling for duplicate emails and invalid data.

subtasks.title: Build Login/Logout Functionality and Session Management
subtasks.description: Implement user login and logout with HTTP-only cookie session management
subtasks.details: Create login page at /login with authentication form. Implement login/logout functions using Appwrite Auth. Setup HTTP-only cookie configuration for secure session storage. Handle authentication state changes and redirects. Implement remember me functionality.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test login with valid and invalid credentials. Verify logout clears session properly. Test session persistence across browser refreshes and remember me functionality.

subtasks.title: Create Password Reset Flow and Pages
subtasks.description: Implement complete password reset functionality with forgot password and reset password pages
subtasks.details: Build /forgot-password page with email input form. Create /reset-password page for new password entry. Implement password reset API using Appwrite's password recovery. Handle password reset email sending and token validation. Add proper error handling and user feedback.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test forgot password email sending. Verify reset password link works correctly. Test password update functionality and validation. Ensure expired tokens are handled properly.

subtasks.title: Implement Role-Based Access Control and Route Protection
subtasks.description: Create middleware for route protection and role-based access control system for student, instructor, and admin roles
subtasks.details: Create authentication middleware for protected routes. Implement role-based access control with user roles (student, instructor, admin). Build auth utilities for checking user permissions. Create higher-order components for route protection. Setup role assignment during registration and admin management.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test route protection blocks unauthorized access. Verify role-based permissions work correctly for different user types. Test permission utilities return correct access levels. Validate admin can manage user roles.

tasks.title: Basic Layout and Navigation Components
tasks.description: Create responsive layout components with navigation and routing structure
tasks.details: Build main layout component with header, footer, and sidebar. Create responsive navigation bar with logo, search bar, and auth buttons. Implement mobile hamburger menu. Build dashboard sidebar for authenticated users with role-based menu items. Create breadcrumb component for navigation. Implement dark/light mode toggle using next-themes. Use shadcn/ui components for consistent styling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test responsive design across different screen sizes. Verify navigation works correctly for different user roles. Test dark/light mode switching functionality.

subtasks.title: Create Main Layout Component with Header and Footer
subtasks.description: Build the main layout wrapper component that includes header and footer sections for consistent page structure
subtasks.details: Create a MainLayout component using Next.js layout patterns. Include header with logo placement, footer with basic links, and main content area. Use shadcn/ui components for consistent styling. Ensure proper semantic HTML structure with header, main, and footer tags.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test layout renders correctly on different pages. Verify header and footer appear consistently across routes.

subtasks.title: Build Responsive Navigation Bar with Auth Elements
subtasks.description: Create responsive navigation bar with logo, search functionality, and authentication buttons
subtasks.details: Implement navigation bar component with logo, search bar, and login/signup buttons. Use responsive design patterns to hide/show elements on different screen sizes. Integrate with authentication state to show user avatar/menu when logged in. Use shadcn/ui Button and Input components.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test navigation responsiveness across mobile, tablet, and desktop. Verify auth buttons show/hide based on authentication state.

subtasks.title: Implement Mobile Hamburger Menu
subtasks.description: Create collapsible mobile navigation menu with hamburger icon for small screens
subtasks.details: Build hamburger menu component that appears on mobile screens. Include slide-out or dropdown menu with navigation links. Use shadcn/ui Sheet or Dropdown components. Implement smooth animations for menu open/close. Include close button and overlay functionality.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test hamburger menu functionality on mobile devices. Verify menu opens/closes smoothly and displays all navigation items.

subtasks.title: Create Dashboard Sidebar with Role-based Navigation
subtasks.description: Build dashboard sidebar component with role-based menu items for authenticated users
subtasks.details: Create sidebar component for dashboard pages with navigation items based on user roles (student/instructor). Include icons and labels for each menu item. Implement active state highlighting. Use conditional rendering to show different menu items for students vs instructors. Integrate with routing for navigation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test sidebar shows correct menu items for different user roles. Verify active state highlighting works correctly. Test navigation between dashboard sections.

subtasks.title: Implement Dark/Light Mode Toggle and Breadcrumb Navigation
subtasks.description: Add theme switching functionality and breadcrumb component for enhanced navigation
subtasks.details: Integrate next-themes for dark/light mode switching. Create theme toggle button in navigation bar. Build breadcrumb component that shows current page hierarchy. Implement breadcrumb logic to generate paths based on current route. Style both components using shadcn/ui with proper theme support.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test theme switching works across all components. Verify breadcrumb navigation displays correct path hierarchy. Test theme persistence across page refreshes.

tasks.title: File Upload System
tasks.description: Create comprehensive file upload system for videos, images, and resources
tasks.details: Build API routes: POST /api/upload/video, POST /api/upload/image, POST /api/upload/resource, DELETE /api/upload/[key]. Implement multipart upload for large video files. Create upload components with progress indicators and drag-and-drop functionality. Add file type validation and size limits (videos: 2GB, images: 10MB, resources: 100MB). Implement thumbnail generation for videos. Create upload queue system for multiple files.
tasks.testStrategy: Test upload of different file types and sizes. Verify progress indicators work correctly. Test file validation and error handling. Validate files are properly stored in R2 with correct folder structure.

subtasks.title: Build File Upload API Routes
subtasks.description: Create API endpoints for handling different file types with proper validation and error handling
subtasks.details: Implement POST /api/upload/video, POST /api/upload/image, POST /api/upload/resource, and DELETE /api/upload/[key] endpoints. Add file type validation, size limits (videos: 2GB, images: 10MB, resources: 100MB), and proper error responses. Integrate with Cloudflare R2 for file storage.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test each endpoint with valid and invalid file types, test size limit enforcement, verify proper error messages for validation failures

subtasks.title: Implement Multipart Upload for Large Files
subtasks.description: Create multipart upload functionality specifically for large video files to improve reliability
subtasks.details: Implement chunked upload mechanism for video files larger than 100MB. Create resume functionality for interrupted uploads. Add progress tracking and chunk validation. Handle multipart upload completion and cleanup of failed uploads.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test large video file uploads, verify resume functionality works after interruption, test cleanup of incomplete uploads

subtasks.title: Create Upload UI Components with Progress Indicators
subtasks.description: Build user interface components for file uploads with drag-and-drop and progress tracking
subtasks.details: Create reusable upload components with drag-and-drop zones, file selection buttons, progress bars, and upload status indicators. Implement preview functionality for images and basic file info display. Add cancel upload functionality and error state handling.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test drag-and-drop functionality across different browsers, verify progress indicators update correctly, test cancel upload feature

subtasks.title: Implement Video Thumbnail Generation
subtasks.description: Create automatic thumbnail generation system for uploaded video files
subtasks.details: Implement server-side video processing to generate thumbnails at multiple timestamps (e.g., 10%, 25%, 50% of video duration). Store thumbnails in R2 thumbnails/ folder. Create API endpoint to retrieve thumbnail URLs. Handle video processing queue for background thumbnail generation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test thumbnail generation for various video formats, verify thumbnails are properly stored and accessible, test thumbnail retrieval API

subtasks.title: Build Upload Queue System for Multiple Files
subtasks.description: Create queue management system to handle multiple concurrent file uploads efficiently
subtasks.details: Implement upload queue with configurable concurrency limits (e.g., max 3 simultaneous uploads). Add queue status tracking, retry logic for failed uploads, and batch upload completion notifications. Create queue management UI showing upload progress for all files.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test multiple file uploads with queue management, verify concurrency limits work correctly, test retry functionality for failed uploads

tasks.title: User Profile Management
tasks.description: Implement user profile creation and management functionality
tasks.details: Create user profile pages and forms. Build profile editing functionality with avatar upload. Implement password change feature. Create user settings page with notification preferences. Add profile validation and update logic. Store extended user data in Appwrite Users collection. Create profile picture upload with image resizing and optimization.
tasks.testStrategy: Test profile creation and editing. Verify avatar upload and display works correctly. Test password change functionality. Validate user data persistence.

subtasks.title: Create User Profile Pages and Forms
subtasks.description: Build the user profile display page and profile editing forms with proper validation
subtasks.details: Create /profile page to display user information. Build profile editing form with fields for name, bio, contact info. Implement form validation for required fields and data formats. Create responsive design for mobile and desktop views.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test profile page displays user data correctly. Verify form validation works for all fields. Test responsive design on different screen sizes.

subtasks.title: Implement Avatar Upload and Image Processing
subtasks.description: Build profile picture upload functionality with image resizing and optimization
subtasks.details: Create file upload component for profile pictures. Implement image resizing to standard dimensions (e.g., 200x200px). Add image optimization to reduce file size. Store images in Appwrite Storage with proper permissions. Handle image preview and cropping functionality.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test image upload with various file formats and sizes. Verify image resizing and optimization works correctly. Test image display and storage persistence.

subtasks.title: Build Password Change Feature
subtasks.description: Implement secure password change functionality with proper validation
subtasks.details: Create password change form with current password, new password, and confirm password fields. Implement password strength validation and matching confirmation. Use Appwrite Auth API to update user password securely. Add success/error feedback messages.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test password change with valid and invalid current passwords. Verify password strength validation works. Test error handling for failed password updates.

subtasks.title: Create User Settings and Notification Preferences
subtasks.description: Build user settings page with notification preferences and account options
subtasks.details: Create settings page with notification preference toggles (email notifications, course updates, marketing emails). Add account settings like timezone, language preferences. Implement settings persistence in Appwrite Users collection. Create intuitive UI for managing preferences.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test notification preference toggles save correctly. Verify settings persistence across sessions. Test all account setting options work as expected.

subtasks.title: Implement Profile Data Validation and Update Logic
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive profile validation and update logic with Appwrite integration
subtasks.details: Implement server-side validation for all profile fields. Create API endpoints for profile updates using Appwrite Users collection. Add client-side validation with real-time feedback. Implement optimistic updates with error rollback. Handle concurrent update conflicts and data synchronization.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test all validation rules work correctly. Verify profile updates persist in database. Test error handling for failed updates and network issues. Validate concurrent update scenarios.

tasks.title: Course CRUD Operations
tasks.description: Implement complete course creation, reading, updating, and deletion functionality
tasks.details: Create API routes for course management: GET /api/courses, POST /api/courses, PUT /api/courses/[id], DELETE /api/courses/[id]. Implement course creation wizard with steps: basic info, curriculum, pricing, publish. Build course editing interface with rich text editor for descriptions. Add course status management (draft/published/archived). Implement slug generation and validation. Create course validation logic and error handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test complete course CRUD operations. Verify course creation wizard works through all steps. Test course editing and status changes. Validate slug generation and uniqueness.

subtasks.title: Implement Course API Routes
subtasks.description: Create all RESTful API endpoints for course management operations
subtasks.details: Implement GET /api/courses for listing courses, POST /api/courses for creating new courses, PUT /api/courses/[id] for updating existing courses, and DELETE /api/courses/[id] for deleting courses. Include proper request validation, error handling, and response formatting.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test all CRUD operations with various payloads. Verify proper HTTP status codes and error responses. Test authentication and authorization for each endpoint.

subtasks.title: Build Course Creation Wizard
subtasks.description: Develop multi-step course creation interface with guided workflow
subtasks.details: Create a step-by-step wizard with four main steps: basic course information (title, description, category), curriculum structure setup, pricing configuration, and final publish settings. Include form validation, progress indicators, and ability to save drafts at each step.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test wizard navigation between steps. Verify form validation works at each step. Test draft saving and restoration functionality. Validate complete course creation flow.

subtasks.title: Implement Course Editing Interface
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive course editing interface with rich text capabilities
subtasks.details: Build course editing page with rich text editor for course descriptions and content. Include image upload functionality, formatting options, and preview capabilities. Implement auto-save functionality and version control for course content changes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test rich text editor functionality including formatting and media uploads. Verify auto-save works correctly. Test course content updates and preview functionality.

subtasks.title: Add Course Status Management
subtasks.description: Implement course lifecycle status management system
subtasks.details: Create status management for courses with three states: draft (editable, not public), published (live and purchasable), and archived (no longer available for purchase). Include status transition validation, bulk status operations, and status-based access control throughout the application.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test status transitions and validation rules. Verify access control works based on course status. Test bulk status operations and status filtering in course listings.

subtasks.title: Implement Slug Generation and Validation
subtasks.description: Create automatic slug generation system with uniqueness validation
subtasks.details: Build automatic slug generation from course titles with URL-safe formatting. Implement uniqueness validation to prevent duplicate slugs. Include manual slug editing capability with real-time availability checking. Add slug history tracking for SEO purposes and redirect management.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test automatic slug generation from various course titles. Verify uniqueness validation prevents duplicates. Test manual slug editing and availability checking. Validate slug formatting and URL safety.

tasks.title: Module and Lesson Management
tasks.description: Create module and lesson management system with drag-and-drop ordering
tasks.details: Build API routes for modules: GET /api/modules/[courseId], POST /api/modules, PUT /api/modules/[id], DELETE /api/modules/[id], PUT /api/modules/reorder. Create lesson APIs: GET /api/lessons/[id], POST /api/lessons, PUT /api/lessons/[id], DELETE /api/lessons/[id], PUT /api/lessons/reorder. Implement drag-and-drop interface for reordering modules and lessons. Create lesson editor with video upload, description, and resource attachment. Add lesson preview functionality for free lessons.
tasks.testStrategy: Test module and lesson creation, editing, and deletion. Verify drag-and-drop reordering works correctly. Test lesson video upload and resource attachment. Validate lesson preview functionality.

subtasks.title: Build Module API Routes
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive API endpoints for module management including CRUD operations and reordering
subtasks.details: Implement GET /api/modules/[courseId] to fetch all modules for a course, POST /api/modules to create new modules, PUT /api/modules/[id] to update existing modules, DELETE /api/modules/[id] to remove modules, and PUT /api/modules/reorder for drag-and-drop ordering. Include proper validation, error handling, and authorization checks.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test all CRUD operations with valid and invalid data. Verify authorization prevents unauthorized access. Test reordering functionality with various scenarios.

subtasks.title: Build Lesson API Routes
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive API endpoints for lesson management including CRUD operations and reordering
subtasks.details: Implement GET /api/lessons/[id] to fetch lesson details, POST /api/lessons to create new lessons, PUT /api/lessons/[id] to update existing lessons, DELETE /api/lessons/[id] to remove lessons, and PUT /api/lessons/reorder for drag-and-drop ordering. Include proper validation, error handling, and authorization checks.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test all CRUD operations with valid and invalid data. Verify authorization prevents unauthorized access. Test reordering functionality maintains proper lesson sequence.

subtasks.title: Implement Drag-and-Drop Interface
subtasks.description: Create interactive drag-and-drop interface for reordering modules and lessons in the curriculum
subtasks.details: Build React components with drag-and-drop functionality using libraries like react-beautiful-dnd or @dnd-kit. Implement visual feedback during dragging, handle drop zones for modules and lessons, and integrate with reorder API endpoints. Include optimistic updates and error handling for failed reorder operations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test drag-and-drop functionality across different browsers. Verify reordering updates correctly in database. Test edge cases like dragging to invalid positions.

subtasks.title: Create Lesson Editor with Media Upload
subtasks.description: Build comprehensive lesson editor with video upload, description editing, and resource attachment capabilities
subtasks.details: Create lesson editor interface with rich text editor for descriptions, video upload integration with Cloudflare R2, file attachment system for resources, and lesson metadata management. Include progress indicators for uploads, file validation, and preview functionality. Support multiple file formats and size limits.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test video upload with various file formats and sizes. Verify resource attachment functionality. Test rich text editor saves content correctly. Validate file size and format restrictions.

subtasks.title: Add Lesson Preview Functionality
subtasks.description: Implement lesson preview system for free lessons with proper access control and video streaming
subtasks.details: Create lesson preview components that allow viewing of free lessons without enrollment. Implement access control logic to determine which lessons are previewable. Add video player with streaming capabilities, lesson description display, and clear indicators for premium content. Include preview duration limits if needed.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test preview functionality shows only designated free lessons. Verify video streaming works correctly. Test access control prevents unauthorized preview access. Validate preview indicators display properly.

tasks.title: Course Listing and Search
tasks.description: Build public course catalog with filtering, searching, and pagination
tasks.details: Create /courses page with grid/list view toggle. Implement filtering by category, level, and price range. Add search functionality for course titles and descriptions. Build sorting options (newest, price, popularity). Implement pagination with infinite scroll option. Create course card component with thumbnail, title, price, rating, and instructor info. Add category-based course browsing at /categories/[slug].
tasks.testStrategy: Test course listing displays correctly. Verify filtering and search functionality works. Test pagination and infinite scroll. Validate course cards display proper information.

subtasks.title: Create Course Listing Page Layout
subtasks.description: Build the main /courses page with responsive grid/list view toggle functionality
subtasks.details: Create the main courses page component with responsive design. Implement view toggle between grid and list layouts. Set up basic page structure with header, filters sidebar, and main content area. Include loading states and empty states for when no courses are found.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test page renders correctly in both grid and list views. Verify responsive design works on mobile and desktop. Test view toggle functionality switches layouts properly.

subtasks.title: Implement Course Card Component
subtasks.description: Create reusable course card component with thumbnail, title, price, rating, and instructor information
subtasks.details: Build a comprehensive course card component that displays course thumbnail image, title, price, star rating, instructor name and avatar. Include hover effects and responsive design. Add fallback images and handle missing data gracefully. Implement click handlers for navigation to course detail page.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test course cards display all information correctly. Verify fallback images work when thumbnails are missing. Test hover effects and click navigation. Validate responsive behavior on different screen sizes.

subtasks.title: Build Filtering and Search System
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive filtering by category, level, price range and search functionality for course titles and descriptions
subtasks.details: Create filter sidebar with category dropdown, level selection (beginner/intermediate/advanced), and price range slider. Implement real-time search functionality that searches through course titles and descriptions. Add clear filters option and active filter indicators. Integrate with backend API for filtered results.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test all filter options work correctly and update results in real-time. Verify search functionality finds relevant courses. Test filter combinations and clear filters functionality. Validate API integration returns correct filtered results.

subtasks.title: Implement Sorting and Pagination
subtasks.description: Add sorting options (newest, price, popularity) and pagination with infinite scroll capability
subtasks.details: Create sorting dropdown with options for newest first, price (low to high/high to low), and popularity. Implement pagination with traditional page numbers and infinite scroll option. Add loading indicators for pagination and infinite scroll. Handle edge cases like last page and network errors.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test all sorting options work correctly and update course order. Verify pagination loads correct number of courses per page. Test infinite scroll loads more courses smoothly. Validate loading states and error handling.

subtasks.title: Create Category-Based Course Browsing

Implement proper validation using Zod schemas. Add admin-only middleware protection. Include error handling and proper HTTP status codes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test all CRUD operations with valid and invalid data. Verify admin-only access restrictions. Test error handling for non-existent categories.

subtasks.title: Create Admin Category Management Interface
subtasks.description: Build admin dashboard pages for managing categories with forms for creation and editing
subtasks.details: Create /admin/categories page with category list, search, and pagination. Build category creation form with name, slug auto-generation, description, icon upload/selection. Implement category editing modal/page. Add delete confirmation dialog. Include category hierarchy visualization if parent categories exist. Use shadcn/ui components for consistent styling.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test category creation form validation. Verify slug auto-generation from name. Test category editing and deletion. Validate admin-only access to management interface.

subtasks.title: Implement Category-Based Course Filtering
subtasks.description: Add category filtering functionality to course listings and search results
subtasks.details: Modify course listing APIs to accept category filter parameter. Update course search functionality to include category-based filtering. Create category filter UI component with checkboxes or dropdown. Implement URL query parameter handling for category filters. Update course cards to display category information. Add 'Clear filters' functionality.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test category filtering on course listings. Verify multiple category selection works. Test URL parameter persistence and sharing. Validate filter reset functionality.

subtasks.title: Build Category Browse Pages and Course Recommendations
subtasks.description: Create dynamic category pages at /categories/[slug] with course listings and recommendation system
subtasks.details: Create dynamic route /categories/[slug] page showing category details and associated courses. Implement category-based course recommendations using related categories or popular courses. Add category breadcrumbs and navigation. Include category description, icon, and course count. Implement pagination for category course listings. Add SEO meta tags for category pages.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test category page rendering with valid slugs. Verify course recommendations display correctly. Test pagination on category pages. Validate SEO meta tags and breadcrumb navigation.

tasks.title: Search and Analytics Implementation
tasks.description: Enhance search functionality and implement basic analytics
tasks.details: Improve search with fuzzy matching and relevance scoring. Create analytics API: GET /api/admin/analytics with revenue, user registration trends, popular courses. Implement search suggestions and autocomplete. Add search result highlighting. Create analytics dashboard with charts and metrics. Implement course popularity tracking based on views and purchases.
tasks.testStrategy: Test enhanced search returns relevant results. Verify analytics display accurate platform metrics. Test search suggestions work correctly. Validate analytics calculations are accurate.

subtasks.title: Implement Enhanced Search with Fuzzy Matching
subtasks.description: Enhance the existing search functionality with fuzzy matching and relevance scoring capabilities
subtasks.details: Implement fuzzy search algorithm using libraries like Fuse.js or custom Levenshtein distance. Add relevance scoring based on title matches, description matches, and course popularity. Update search API endpoint to handle fuzzy queries and return scored results.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test search returns relevant results for misspelled queries. Verify relevance scoring ranks results appropriately. Test search performance with large datasets.

subtasks.title: Build Search Suggestions and Autocomplete
subtasks.description: Implement search suggestions and autocomplete functionality for improved user experience
subtasks.details: Create autocomplete API endpoint that returns suggestions based on partial input. Implement debounced search input component with dropdown suggestions. Add popular search terms and course title suggestions. Cache frequent searches for better performance.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test autocomplete suggestions appear correctly. Verify debouncing prevents excessive API calls. Test suggestion relevance and performance.

subtasks.title: Add Search Result Highlighting
subtasks.description: Implement highlighting of search terms in search results for better visibility
subtasks.details: Create text highlighting utility function that marks search terms in results. Update search result components to display highlighted text in course titles and descriptions. Handle multiple search terms and case-insensitive highlighting.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test search terms are properly highlighted in results. Verify highlighting works with multiple terms. Test case-insensitive highlighting functionality.

subtasks.title: Create Analytics API and Data Collection
subtasks.description: Build analytics API endpoint and implement data collection for platform metrics
subtasks.details: Create GET /api/admin/analytics endpoint returning revenue, user registration trends, and popular courses. Implement course popularity tracking based on views and purchases. Set up data aggregation queries for analytics calculations. Add course view tracking middleware.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test analytics API returns accurate data. Verify course popularity tracking works correctly. Test data aggregation performance and accuracy.

subtasks.title: Build Analytics Dashboard with Charts
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive analytics dashboard with interactive charts and metrics visualization
subtasks.details: Build analytics dashboard page with charts for revenue trends, user registrations, and course popularity. Implement interactive charts using Chart.js or similar library. Add date range filters and metric comparison features. Create responsive dashboard layout for different screen sizes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test dashboard displays charts correctly. Verify interactive features work properly. Test responsive design on different devices. Validate chart data accuracy.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Implement performance optimizations and caching strategies
tasks.details: Implement Next.js Image optimization for course thumbnails and avatars. Add ISR (Incremental Static Regeneration) for course listings. Implement client-side caching with SWR or React Query. Add lazy loading for video content and images. Optimize bundle size with code splitting. Implement CDN caching headers for static assets. Add database query optimization and indexing.
tasks.testStrategy: Test page load times meet performance requirements (<1.5s FCP). Verify image optimization works correctly. Test caching strategies improve performance. Run Lighthouse audits to validate performance scores >90.

subtasks.title: Implement Next.js Image Optimization
subtasks.description: Set up Next.js Image component optimization for course thumbnails and user avatars
subtasks.details: Configure Next.js Image component with proper sizing, quality settings, and format optimization. Replace all img tags with Next.js Image component for course thumbnails and user avatars. Set up image domains in next.config.js for external image sources. Implement responsive image sizing with different breakpoints.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test image loading performance and verify different formats are served based on browser support. Validate responsive sizing works across devices.

subtasks.title: Add ISR for Course Listings
subtasks.description: Implement Incremental Static Regeneration for course listing pages
subtasks.details: Configure ISR for course listing pages with appropriate revalidation intervals. Set up static generation for course detail pages with on-demand revalidation. Implement fallback strategies for new courses. Configure ISR for category and search result pages.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test that course listings are statically generated and revalidated correctly. Verify new courses appear without full rebuild.

subtasks.title: Implement Client-side Caching with SWR
subtasks.description: Set up SWR for client-side data fetching and caching strategies
subtasks.details: Install and configure SWR for API data fetching. Implement custom hooks for course data, user progress, and purchase history. Set up cache invalidation strategies and error handling. Configure background revalidation and focus revalidation settings.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test data caching works correctly and stale data is revalidated. Verify offline functionality and error states.

subtasks.title: Add Lazy Loading and Code Splitting
subtasks.description: Implement lazy loading for video content and optimize bundle size with code splitting
subtasks.details: Implement lazy loading for video players and course images using Intersection Observer. Set up dynamic imports for heavy components like video players and course editors. Configure Next.js code splitting for route-based and component-based splitting. Optimize third-party library imports.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test lazy loading triggers correctly on scroll. Verify bundle sizes are reduced and components load on demand. Run Lighthouse audits to validate performance improvements.

subtasks.title: Database Query Optimization and CDN Setup
subtasks.description: Optimize database queries and implement CDN caching headers for static assets
subtasks.details: Add database indexes for frequently queried fields (courseId, userId, category). Optimize API routes with query batching and pagination. Implement CDN caching headers for static assets with appropriate cache-control directives. Set up database connection pooling and query optimization.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test page load times meet <1.5s FCP requirement. Run database query performance tests. Verify CDN caching works correctly and Lighthouse scores >90.

tasks.title: Security Hardening and Validation
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive security measures and input validation
tasks.details: Add input validation and sanitization on all API endpoints using Zod schemas. Implement rate limiting on authentication and payment endpoints. Add CSRF protection and security headers. Enhance content protection with additional signed URL validation. Implement API route authentication middleware. Add XSS prevention measures and content security policy.
tasks.testStrategy: Test input validation prevents malicious data. Verify rate limiting works on protected endpoints. Test security headers are properly set. Validate content protection prevents unauthorized access.

subtasks.title: Implement Input Validation with Zod Schemas
subtasks.description: Add comprehensive input validation and sanitization on all API endpoints using Zod schemas
subtasks.details: Create Zod validation schemas for all API endpoints including user registration, course creation, payment processing, and content management. Implement middleware to validate request bodies, query parameters, and route parameters. Add sanitization for string inputs to prevent injection attacks. Create reusable validation utilities and error handling for validation failures.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test that malicious input is rejected, valid input passes validation, and appropriate error messages are returned for invalid data

subtasks.title: Implement Rate Limiting on Critical Endpoints
subtasks.description: Add rate limiting protection on authentication and payment endpoints to prevent abuse
subtasks.details: Implement rate limiting middleware using libraries like express-rate-limit or custom Redis-based solution. Configure different rate limits for authentication endpoints (login, register, password reset) and payment endpoints. Set up IP-based and user-based rate limiting. Add proper error responses when rate limits are exceeded. Configure rate limit headers in responses.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test that rate limits are enforced correctly, legitimate users aren't blocked, and attackers are prevented from brute force attempts

subtasks.title: Add CSRF Protection and Security Headers
subtasks.description: Implement CSRF protection and configure comprehensive security headers
subtasks.details: Add CSRF token generation and validation for state-changing operations. Configure security headers including Content-Security-Policy, X-Frame-Options, X-Content-Type-Options, Referrer-Policy, and Strict-Transport-Security. Implement CSRF middleware for forms and API calls. Set up proper CORS configuration for API endpoints.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test CSRF protection prevents cross-site request forgery attacks, security headers are properly set, and legitimate requests work correctly

subtasks.title: Enhance Content Protection with Signed URL Validation
subtasks.description: Implement additional validation for signed URLs to protect premium content access
subtasks.details: Add enhanced validation for AWS S3 signed URLs including expiration checks, user authorization verification, and content access logging. Implement middleware to validate signed URL parameters and ensure users have proper permissions. Add URL tampering detection and logging of suspicious access attempts. Create content access audit trail.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test that only authorized users can access content, expired URLs are rejected, and tampering attempts are detected and logged

subtasks.title: Implement API Authentication Middleware and XSS Prevention
subtasks.description: Add comprehensive API route authentication middleware and XSS prevention measures
subtasks.details: Create authentication middleware for API routes to verify JWT tokens and user permissions. Implement role-based access control for different API endpoints. Add XSS prevention through output encoding, input sanitization, and Content Security Policy configuration. Set up secure cookie handling with httpOnly, secure, and sameSite flags. Implement session management security.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test that unauthenticated requests are blocked, role-based access works correctly, XSS attacks are prevented, and secure session management functions properly

tasks.title: Testing and Production Deployment
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive testing and prepare for production deployment
tasks.details: Set up unit tests for utility functions and API routes using Jest. Implement integration tests for critical user flows (registration, purchase, learning). Add end-to-end tests using Playwright for complete user journeys. Create production environment configuration and deployment scripts. Set up monitoring and error tracking. Implement health check endpoints and logging. Create backup and recovery procedures.
tasks.testStrategy: Run complete test suite and ensure >90% code coverage. Test all critical user flows work correctly. Verify production deployment works without errors. Test monitoring and error tracking capture issues properly.

subtasks.title: Set up comprehensive unit testing with Jest
subtasks.description: Implement unit tests for utility functions and API routes using Jest framework
subtasks.details: Create Jest configuration and test files for all utility functions, API routes, and core business logic. Set up test database and mocking for external dependencies. Implement tests for authentication, course management, payment processing, and user management functions. Ensure proper test isolation and cleanup.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run unit tests and verify >90% code coverage for critical functions

subtasks.title: Implement integration tests for critical user flows
subtasks.description: Create integration tests for registration, purchase, and learning workflows
subtasks.details: Build integration test suite covering user registration flow, course purchase process, and learning progression. Test API endpoints work together correctly, database transactions are handled properly, and user sessions persist across requests. Include tests for payment processing integration and email notifications.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify all critical user journeys work end-to-end without errors

subtasks.title: Add end-to-end tests using Playwright
subtasks.description: Implement E2E tests for complete user journeys using Playwright framework
subtasks.details: Set up Playwright configuration and create E2E test scenarios covering full user workflows from registration to course completion. Test cross-browser compatibility, responsive design, and user interface interactions. Include tests for payment flows, course navigation, and dashboard functionality.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run E2E tests across multiple browsers and verify complete user workflows

subtasks.title: Create production environment and deployment configuration
subtasks.description: Set up production environment configuration and automated deployment scripts
subtasks.details: Create production environment variables, database configuration, and security settings. Build deployment scripts for automated CI/CD pipeline. Configure production server settings, SSL certificates, and domain setup. Implement environment-specific configurations for database connections, API keys, and third-party integrations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test deployment process in staging environment and verify production configuration

subtasks.title: Implement monitoring, logging, and health checks
subtasks.description: Set up comprehensive monitoring, error tracking, logging, and backup procedures
subtasks.details: Implement health check endpoints for application and database status. Set up error tracking with services like Sentry or similar. Create comprehensive logging for API requests, errors, and user actions. Implement monitoring dashboards for system performance. Create automated backup procedures for database and file storage with recovery testing.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test monitoring captures errors correctly and backup/recovery procedures work as expected
